name: Martin Burt
text: @_AdrianBrown @martinburt @CPI_foundation Defining poverty has been ardous job in most of developing world. In develeoped world, its counterpart is income inequality which is even harder to deal with. This approach gives us local, customized view of poverty. Belief in human agecy is core to inclusive development.
